restrooms.name: Grocery Outlet
restrooms.directions: The bathroom is in the back of the grocery outlet. You will probably need to ask a worker if they could open the bathroom for you. Please be respectful. If the store is literally busy, you may need to wait until someone can help you. If you can’t wait, please go to the McDonald’s a few stores down and other fast food places, since you can usually buy something for cheap through the app (or get a food item for free using points) and still use the bathroom.
restrooms.comment: I didn’t use the changing station, but I think they have one. I don’t know what else it would be, if it weren’t a changing station. If you go when the store is crowded, it might be harder to navigate with a mobility device and/or a wheelchair. You may want to ask a trustworthy or safe(r) friend - even if you don’t trust them since trust must be earned not given lol - to help you navigate the store. If you are unfamiliar with an area, I would not recommend going somewhere after sun down. I wouldn’t mind going here after sundown, but if it makes you uncomfortable, just to be on the safe side, you might want to get to know the area before you go at night time. And even then, you might as well ask the locals what they would do.
